mapper.select: select a.room_id, a.room_nm, a.use_fee, a.additional_fee, a.standard_person, a.max_person, b.status_cd from room_info a left outer join ( select a.room_id, 'Y' status_cd from reservation a where STR_TO_DATE(#{reserveDt}, '%Y%m%d') between a.start_dt and a.end_dt and a.reserv_code != 'D' group by a.room_id ) b on a.room_id = b.room_id
select DATE_FORMAT(min(a.start_dt), '%Y-%m-%d') start_dt from reservation a where a.start_dt > STR_TO_DATE(#{reserveDt}, '%Y%m%d') and a.reserv_code in ('A', 'B', 'C', 'D') and a.room_id = #{roomId};

select a.room_id, a.room_nm, a.guest_nm, a.guest_cell_phone, a.start_dt, a.end_dt, a.end_dt-a.start_dt days from ( select a.room_id, b.room_nm, a.guest_nm, a.guest_cell_phone, if ( a.start_dt < str_to_date(#{startDt}, '%Y%m%d'), str_to_date(#{startDt}, '%Y%m%d'), a.start_dt ) as start_dt, if ( a.end_dt > str_to_date(#{endDt}, '%Y%m%d'), str_to_date(#{endDt}, '%Y%m%d'), a.end_dt ) as end_dt from reservation a inner join room_info b on a.room_id = b.room_id where ( a.start_dt between str_to_date(#{startDt}, '%Y%m%d') and str_to_date(#{endDt}, '%Y%m%d') or a.end_dt between str_to_date(#{startDt}, '%Y%m%d') and str_to_date(#{endDt}, '%Y%m%d') ) and a.reserv_code != 'D' ) a order by a.room_id, a.start_dt
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `arasil`.`reservation` (`ROOM_ID`, `GUEST_NM`, `GUEST_CELL_PHONE`, `RESERV_DT`, `START_DT`, `END_DT`, `RESERV_CODE`, `EXTRA_PERSON`, `TOTAL_FEE`, `user_id`) VALUES (#{inputRoomId}, #{inputGuestNm}, #{inputGuestCellPhone}, now(), str_to_date(#{inputStartDt}, '%Y%m%d'), DATE_ADD(str_to_date(#{inputStartDt}, '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL #{inputUseDay}-1 DAY), 'A', #{inputUsePerson}, replace(#{inputTotalFee}, ',' ,''), 'admin' )
mapper.select: select a.reserv_seq, a.room_id, b.room_nm, a.guest_nm, a.reserv_code, a.guest_cell_phone, a.reserv_dt, a.start_dt, a.end_dt, a.end_dt-a.start_dt+1 days, a.extra_person, a.total_fee from reservation a inner join room_info b on a.room_id = b.room_id order by a.reserv_dt desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
